name: delirium (itch) (kasioepeia)
description:
"Is it your fault, Lavender?"

Delirium is about a girl who moved to a new school, in hopes for a fresh new start.  But can you let go of guilt?

___

HIGH VOLUME WARNING

Content warning: Graphic depiction of violence, and self harm. Proceed with caution.

___

Hi! This is my first time completing a full game, so I apologize for the imperfections.

It takes a while to load the game, but it does work :)

 I hope you will enjoy it.  Thank you for checking it out! <3

-kasio
